entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fisher Branch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fisher Branch 01:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -33.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -37.2°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
